code: import React from'react';import classes from'./Order.module.css';var Order=function Order(_ref){var ingredients=_ref.ingredients,price=_ref.price;var transformedIngredients=[];for(var ingredientName in ingredients){transformedIngredients.push({name:ingredientName,amount:ingredients[ingredientName]});}var ingredientsOutput=transformedIngredients.map(function(ingredient){return React.createElement("span",{style:{textTransform:'capitalize',display:'inline-block',margin:'0 8px',border:'1px solid #ccc',padding:'5px'},key:ingredient.name},ingredient.name," (",ingredient.amount,")");});return React.createElement("div",{className:classes.Order},React.createElement("p",null,"Ingredients: ",ingredientsOutput),React.createElement("p",null,"Price: ",React.createElement("strong",null,"USD ",Number.parseFloat(price).toFixed(2))));};export default Order;
